Have you considered checking out "This Is Spinal Tap"? It's a classic mockumentary that follows a fictional British heavy metal band on their disastrous US tour, and it's all about what happens when things get weird and wacky. With an amazing cast of characters, including Christopher Guest and Michael McKean, this film is sure to tickle your funny bone!

If you're not in the mood for something as absurdly hilarious, I could also recommend "The Trouble with Harry". It's a 1950s classic that explores what happens when a small town discovers a dead body in the woods, and everyone starts scrambling to figure out what happened. With Alfred Hitchcock behind the camera, you can be sure it'll be a gripping and entertaining ride!

I think you might really enjoy "The Andromeda Strain"! It's a classic sci-fi thriller that explores what happens when a mysterious contagion sweeps through a small town, and top scientists must work together to stop it. With its intriguing plot and thought-provoking themes, I think you'll find it's well worth watching.

If you're in the mood for something a bit more offbeat, "Zero Effect" is also an excellent choice. It's a quirky detective comedy that follows the world's greatest detective as he takes on a complex case involving blackmail and missing keys. With its clever writing and great performances from Ben Stiller and Ryan O'Neal, I think you'll have a blast watching it!
